description:
Providing full step-in functionality, you can use these brakes instead of safety straps in avalanche terrain.

  • Use on 2004 and later model Fritschi® Diamir bindings
  • Not compatible with pre-2004 models or Fritschi Diamir Vipec
  • Width for Medium is 82mm, Large is 95mm, XL is 108mm, XXL is 120mm
name: Fritschi Diamir Brakes
